subject: Implement Phase 12: Growth Projections
body:
Add multi-year financial projections with:
- NPV calculations per party (Developer, Buyer, Combined)
- IRR calculations using Newton-Raphson method
- Payback period calculations (simple and discounted)
- Asset value trajectories with enhancements
- Revenue break-even analysis
- Projection visualizations: cash flow charts, ROI trajectory,
  asset value charts, and investment assessment dashboards
- Configurable parameters: projection period, discount rate,
  revenue growth, inflation, and enhancement costs
- New "Projections" tab in the inter-company calculator
title: Implement Phase 12: Growth Projections
